# JsonPointer.Concat method

Concatenates two JSON pointers.

```csharp
public JsonPointer Concat(JsonPointer pointer)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| pointer | The other pointer. |

## Return Value

The two JSON pointers, concatenated.
